subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Move aside, Ronaldo, Messi and Villa. Bow to the record created in Italy when Alessandro Del Piero eclipsed Giampiero Boniperti as the record goal scorer in the history of Juventus.
snippet: Move aside, Ronaldo, Messi and Villa. Bow to the record created in Italy when Alessandro Del Piero eclipsed Giampiero Boniperti as the record goal scorer in the history of Juventus.
